sentences.en: Also, the default setting for Unicode Collation is case - insensitive.
sentences.cn: 并且, unicode排列的默认设置为不区分大小写.

sentences.en: Attempting to change default collation to % 1.
sentences.cn: 试图将默认的排序规则更改为%1.

sentences.en: But the ruling collation in Parliament said the President's order was illegal.
sentences.cn: 但是国会宪法修订者说总统的命令是违法的.

sentences.en: Cannot resolve collation conflict for % ls operation.
sentences.cn: 无法解决%1!操作的排序规则冲突.

sentences.en: Cannot resolve collation conflict for column % d in % ls statement.
sentences.cn: 无法解决列%1!(在%2!语句中)的排序规则冲突.

sentences.en: CHAR Stores single-byte or multibyte text strings of fixed length (up to 32,767 bytes); supports code-set order in collation of text data.
sentences.cn: CHAR 存储固定长度的单字节或多字节的文本字符串（最高可达 32,767 个字节）；在整理文本数据时支持使用代码集顺序。

sentences.en: Drag onto the page to add a collation of data.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页后,可以添加数据整理.

sentences.en: During the re - collation of the dictionary, 72 misuses of words were found.
sentences.cn: 重新勘定的辞典共校正出字词错误72处.

sentences.en: However, the collation would be wrong when the number of digits changed, so leading zeroes are provided.
sentences.cn: 不过，如果数字的位数发生了变化，整理就会发生错误， 所以要给出前导的零。

sentences.en: I was quite taken with your line of photocopiers with collation and stapling capability.
sentences.cn: 我被贵公司能够自动整理和装订的系列复印机吸引住了.

sentences.en: It was in this choice retreat that Mr. Quilp ordered a cold collation to be prepared.
sentences.cn: 奎尔普先生就是在这个精美的别墅里预定冷点的.

sentences.en: Objective : To evaluate the efficacy of collation tissue volume reduction of tonsils.
sentences.cn: 目的: 观察低温等离子扁桃体减容术的疗效.

sentences.en: The collation that you entered is incomplete or invalid.
sentences.cn: 您输入的排序规则不完整或无效.

sentences.en: The specified database collation name is not valid.
sentences.cn: 指定的数据库排序规则名称无效.

sentences.en: Under strong pressure breakthrough after collation, short - term uptrend is expected to renew.
sentences.cn: 突破下压后强势整理, 短期 有望延续升势.

sentences.en: Unrecognized unicode collation values, using default values.
sentences.cn: 不能识别的编码序列值, 请使用默认值.

sentences.en: We should affirm Wang Jipei's achievements on collation.
sentences.cn: 应该全面肯定汪继培对《潜夫论》整理工作的贡献.

words.tran_cn: 校对；斋日的点心；牧师职务

trans.tran_en: the act or process of collating
